about_the_game:
In the DLC version, you can learn the secrets of the goddesses and enjoy more artistic illustrations.

Game introduction

Enemies will continue to appear from the right side of the screen, but there is a word above each enemy's head. You need to use the keyboard in your hand to enter the corresponding letter correctly to destroy the enemy and prevent them from reaching the far left of the screen.
You'll encounter different types of enemies, including fast ninjas, goblins that summon little brothers, and slow-moving but healthy rock monsters. In order to stop them, you need to exert great typing skills.

content_descriptors.notes: Every time you pass 6 levels, you can see a new character.

You'll encounter different types of enemies, including fast ninjas, goblins that summon little brothers, and slow-moving but healthy rock monsters. In order to stop them, you need to exert great typing skills.
name: TYPER GIRL 18+ DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0a
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: In the DLC version, you can learn the secrets of the goddesses and enjoy more artistic illustrations.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Hungarian
